name: Pro Stylist Hair Dye Studio
description:
Ever wondered what it would be like to dye hair. Whether you're a pro in real life already or an up and coming enthusiast it's never been easier. This app offers an user friendly ui that you will come across. Mock up a hair dye style in minutes or spend a little time making a master piece. Fun for kids and adults alike. Prep work never seemed so real with this app if your an hair dye artist. It doesn't stop there, you will also be able to color eyes, lips, and eyebrows to match your new hairstyle.

Feature Tools:

Bleach: Make a mistake? No problem when you have the bleach to reverse your process

Clear: Want a restart? This feature offers a total reset

Color picker: This tool offers as many colors as you can handle. Never feel limited again

Magnify: Get a little closer to your work with the magnify tool. 

Brush size: Get a little more in depth with the brush size tool. Many ranges to set the pace of your work

What are you waiting for? Start today and show the world your work of art tomorrow
